meanings.definition: Being the second of two mentioned things.
meanings.sent1: In the latter part of the story, the hero finally defeats the villain.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the latter option over the former.
meanings.sent3: The latter half of the cake mysteriously disappeared before the party.
meanings.sent4: His latter attempt at painting was much better than his first.
meanings.sent5: The latter half of the rainbow was the brightest and most colorful.

meanings.definition: The second mentioned of two things.
meanings.sent1: He chose the latter of the two books to read first.
meanings.sent2: The former house was smaller than the latter.
meanings.sent3: The latter of the two puppies was the mischievous one.
meanings.sent4: She always forgets the latter of the pair of socks.
meanings.sent5: The latter of the twins arrived just in time for the party.
